DOC.brief_summary: A new formulation of methylprednisolone is being developed. A study is needed to determine the drug availability using the new formulation, a powder for reconstitution into a suspension, versus the current commercially available tablet formulation in healthy volunteers.
DOC.brief_title: A Study Comparing Drug Availability Of Methylprednisolone In Liquid Form Versus Methylprednisolone In Tablet Form
DOC.criteria: Body Mass Index (BMI) of 17.5 to 30.5 kg/m2; a total body weight >45 kg (99 lbs). Evidence or history of clinically significant hematological, renal, endocrine, pulmonary, gastrointestinal, cardiovascular, hepatic, psychiatric, neurologic, or allergic disease; Any condition possibly affecting drug absorption (eg, gastrectomy).
DOC.keyword: Single dose bioavailability study of methylprednisolone powder for oral suspension (4mg/mL) versus methylprednisolone tablet (32 mg)
